Some Highlights

  • 2025: A short Interview about our edge computing work @ Communications of ACM May 2025 by Gregory Mone.

  • 2025: 4TU.NIRICT (4TU.NIRICT is the Netherlands Institute for Research on ICT) Community Day 2025 video

  • I/O Magazine interview July 2022.

  • EERI video 2022.

  • Best paper award, IEEE WoWMoM 2020 for Punched Cards over the Air: CTC Between LTE-U/LAA and WiFi by Piotr Gawlowicz, Anatolij Zubow, Suzan Bayhan, Adam Wolisz [paper]

  • Best demo award, IEEE INFOCOM 2020 for Demo: Cross-Technology Communication between LTE-U/LAA and WiFi by Piotr Gawlowicz, Anatolij Zubow, Suzan Bayhan [abstract]

  • Best paper award, ACM ICN 2015 for Pro-Diluvian: Understanding Scoped-Flooding for Content Discovery in ICN by Liang Wang, Suzan Bayhan, Jörg Ott, Jussi Kangasharju, Arjuna Sathiaseelan, Jon Crowcroft [paper]
